attributes.action: Bring back Full House on Netflix UK
attributes.additional_details:
Many people are only discovering this family friendly show now during lockdown and it’s a treat to watch together.
It’s unfortunate that the show has been removed on for the UK and is still available for those in America and Canada
attributes.background: Allow the famous American TV show Full House to stay on Netflix for UK watchers

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for Netflix.
